#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;


int main() {
				int m,n,p,x,y;

				cin >> m >> n >> p;
				ll grid[m+1][n+1];
				
				memset(grid, 0, sizeof(grid));		
				 
				for ( int i = 0; i < p; i ++ ){
					cin >> x>>y;
					grid[x][y] = -1;
				}
				
				if (grid[1][1] == -1) {
					cout<<"0\n";
					return 0;
				}	
				
				for ( int i = 1; i <= m; i ++ ) {
					if ( grid[i][1] == 0) grid[i][1] = 1;
					else break;
				}
				for ( int i = 2; i <= n; i ++ ) {
					if (grid[1][i] == 0) grid[1][i] = 1;
					else break;
				}
				for ( int i = 2; i <= m; i ++ ) {
					for ( int j = 2; j <=n ; j ++ ) {
						if (grid[i][j] == -1) continue;
						if(grid[i-1][j] > 0 ) grid[i][j] = (grid[i][j] + grid[i-1][j] + mod) %mod;
						if(grid[i][j-1] > 0 ) grid[i][j] = (grid[i][j] + grid[i][j-1] + mod) %mod;
 					}
				}
				cout<<(grid[m][n] >= 0 ? grid[m][n] : 0)<<endl;
	
	return 0;
}
